summary: Two aging gunfighters (Nelson, Kristofferson) re-form their old gang to avenge the murder of one of the former members.
cast: Willie Nelson|Kris Kristofferson|Chad Willett|Waylon Jennings|Travis Tritt|Sancho Gracia|Jonathan Banks|Simón Andreu|Jorge Bosso|Francis Butler|Ignacio Durán|Vincent Ginarbi|May Heatherly|Eduardo Hererra|Bill Holden|Tony Isbert|Lance Kinsey|Mark Newsom|Alito Rodgers|Aldo Sambrell|Manuel San Martín|Marina Saura|Pablo Scola|Danny Sullivan|Leonor Watling
keywords: two gun holster|gun|gun holster|holster|double gun holster
title: La justicia de los forajidos
